channel.title: Anyone got the ::emote (idhere?)
channel.description: hi... i'm adding skillcape emotes to my server and by an accident i deleted my hitpoints emote... i have the gfx but i can't find the emote for it... so if anybody have the emoteid for hitpoints skillcape it would have been nice :)

item.title: Anyone got the ::emote (idhere?)
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("stgfx") && playerRights >= 1) { try { int gfx = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(6)); if (gfx < 900 && gfx > 0) { stillgfx(gfx, absY, absX); } else { sendMessage("Bad gfx ID"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Bad gfx ID"); } }
} else if (command.startsWith("emote") && playerRights >= 1) { try { int emote = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(6)); 
            /*if (emote < 3217 && emote > 0) {*/
	if (emote < 10000 && emote > 0) {
                startAnimation(emote);
            } else {
                sendMessage("Bad emote ID");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Bad emote ID"); 
        }</blockquote>

if you got it loaded with SWAT search your class20.java

Read full topic
